price: And fight in the way of Allah and know that Allah is All-Hearing, All-Knowing.
arabic: وَقَٰتِلُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
